byline.contributor: Adam Nagourney contributed reporting from Las Vegas.

abstract: Bill Clinton campaigns in Iowa for Hillary Clinton in advance of Iowa caucuses, but former president seems to have lost some of his old magic as he fails to offer pointed critique of her main opponent Sen Bernie Sanders; while Clinton at times displays flashes of his former brilliance, even some of his admirers observe that something is missing.
lead_paragraph: As the former president tries to energize his wife’s campaign, even some of his admirers wonder about his more subdued style and faded magnetism.

headline.main: It’s Still Bill Clinton, but the Old Magic Seems to Be Missing
headline.print_headline: It’s Still Bill Clinton, but Some Magic Seems to Be Missing

snippet: As the former president tries to energize his wife’s campaign, even some of his admirers wonder about his more subdued style and faded magnetism.
